get.description: Search entries across all database types. Supports keyword search, filtering by type/organism/date, sorting, and pagination.

parameters.name: keywords

schema.description: Free-text search query. Supports comma-separated multiple values (e.g., 'cancer,genome').
schema.title: Keywords

parameters.description: Free-text search query. Supports comma-separated multiple values (e.g., 'cancer,genome').

parameters.name: keywords.fields

schema.description: Restrict keyword search to specific fields (comma-separated, e.g., 'title,description').
schema.title: Keywords.Fields

parameters.description: Restrict keyword search to specific fields (comma-separated, e.g., 'title,description').

parameters.name: keywords.operator

schema.description: Logical operator for combining multiple keywords. 'AND' requires all keywords to match, 'OR' requires any keyword to match.
schema.title: Keywords.Operator

parameters.description: Logical operator for combining multiple keywords. 'AND' requires all keywords to match, 'OR' requires any keyword to match.

parameters.name: types

schema.description: Filter by database types (comma-separated, e.g., 'bioproject,biosample'). See DbType enum for valid values.
schema.title: Types

parameters.description: Filter by database types (comma-separated, e.g., 'bioproject,biosample'). See DbType enum for valid values.

parameters.name: organism

schema.description: Filter by organism using NCBI Taxonomy ID (e.g., '9606' for Homo sapiens).
schema.title: Organism

parameters.description: Filter by organism using NCBI Taxonomy ID (e.g., '9606' for Homo sapiens).

parameters.name: datePublished

schema.description: Filter by publication date range in 'start,end' format (e.g., '2020-01-01,2024-12-31'). Use ISO 8601 dates.
schema.title: Datepublished

parameters.description: Filter by publication date range in 'start,end' format (e.g., '2020-01-01,2024-12-31'). Use ISO 8601 dates.

parameters.name: dateUpdated

schema.description: Filter by last update date range in 'start,end' format (e.g., '2020-01-01,2024-12-31'). Use ISO 8601 dates.
schema.title: Dateupdated

parameters.description: Filter by last update date range in 'start,end' format (e.g., '2020-01-01,2024-12-31'). Use ISO 8601 dates.

parameters.name: sort

schema.description: Sort order in 'field:direction' format (e.g., 'datePublished:desc'). Single-field sorting only.
schema.title: Sort

parameters.description: Sort order in 'field:direction' format (e.g., 'datePublished:desc'). Single-field sorting only.

parameters.name: page

schema.description: Page number (1-indexed).
schema.title: Page

parameters.description: Page number (1-indexed).

parameters.name: perPage

schema.description: Number of items per page (1-100, default: 10).
schema.title: Perpage

parameters.description: Number of items per page (1-100, default: 10).

parameters.name: fields

schema.description: Select specific fields to include in the response (comma-separated, e.g., 'identifier,title,organism'). If omitted, all fields are returned.
schema.title: Fields

parameters.description: Select specific fields to include in the response (comma-separated, e.g., 'identifier,title,organism'). If omitted, all fields are returned.
